content:
For the mobile app, we need to decide what to show as the avatar for a user that has been muted (in, for instance, group PMs and reaction emoji lists)

Does anyone have proposals for what this should look like, or want to make the asset for this? It'll almost always show up next to the label "Muted User", so something iconographic is probably best (maybe a "user" icon with a slash through it?).
What are we doing in the web app?
The web app doesn't have any places where it would want to show the avatar of a muted user without the user deliberately showing the message â€” the mobile app makes more liberal use of user avatars.
I think a user-slash icon on a simple background (E.g. plain grey) is probably reasonable.
